variable.name: Sex
variable.comment: For NUgene subjects, from question 2 on the NUgene questionnaire.

variable.name: Age
variable.comment: For NUgene 'Controls' - age at time of study; for 'Cases' - age of disease onset.

variable.name: BMI
variable.comment: For NUgene subjects, BMI is calculated from NUgene questionnaire data (questions 5, 6 on older version and questions 5-7 on newer version), supplemented with EMR data where not reported on the NUgene questionnaire.

variable.name: Race
variable.comment: For NUgene subjects, derived from the ethnic questions on the NUgene questionnaire (question 14 on older version and question 18 on newer version), supplemented with EMR data where not reported on the NUgene questionnaire.

variable.name: Ethnicity
variable.comment: For NUgene subjects, derived from NUgene questionnaire (question 14 on older version and question 19 on newer version), supplemented with EMR data where not reported on the NUgene questionnaire.
